page.title: 19PARISH COUNCIL WICKERSLEY
page.content: The Parish Council comprises 16 councillors and 1 clerk who records what happens at meetings.Meetings are held once a month to discuss what has happened that month. Our Parish Council is responsible for, wayside seats, playing fields by installing recreational facilities like swings,climbing frames,slides and B.M.X. tracks etc,a landscaped area like Sorby Way field with B.M.X track, keeping the village tidy by doing keep Britain tidy morning where there are a few groups of people who have a black bag and go round with a councillor or a grown_up and pick up litter. Sometimes they weed certain places.They look after Wickersley, Village Hall,village exhibition,bus shelters,Wickersley woods by paying wardens to care for wildlife.They get their money from the local rates
